tagline:
Nourishing Communities,
One Byte at a Time!
inventoryDesc: Effortlessly monitor and contribute to our inventory online, ensuring transparency and convenience in accessing and donating items.
giveDesc: Contribute to our mission of alleviating hunger by supporting us through monetary donations and food contributions.
volunteerDesc: Join us in the fight against hunger by volunteering at our food bank and making a meaningful difference in the lives of those in need.

signUp.emailVerificationMessage: Please check your email and verify your account before signing in.

dashboard.loginPromptMessage: To access your dashboard and start making a difference in your community, please sign in to your account.
dashboard.newUserMessage: New to ByteBasket? Join our community to help nourish families in need.
dashboard.accountNotFoundMessage: We couldn't find your account details. Please sign in again to access your dashboard and continue helping your community.
dashboard.communityMessage: Join thousands of people making a difference in their communities through ByteBasket.

footer.description: Nourishing Communities, One Byte at a Time! Connecting food donors with those in need through technology and community spirit.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about volunteering, need assistance with donations, or want to learn more about our mission, we're here to help.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

q1.question: How can I become a volunteer?
q1.answer: Simply click on the "Volunteer" link in our navigation menu and fill out our registration form. We'll review your application and get back to you within 48 hours.

q2.question: What types of donations do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept both monetary donations and food items. Non-perishable foods, fresh produce, and packaged goods are always needed. Check our donation page for specific requirements.

q3.question: Are there volunteer opportunities for groups?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We welcome corporate groups, school classes, and community organizations. Contact us to arrange group volunteer sessions and team-building opportunities.

q4.question: How do you ensure food safety?
q4.answer: Food safety is our top priority. All volunteers receive training on proper food handling, and we follow strict guidelines for food storage, preparation, and distribution.

landing.heroTitle: Explore the rewarding world of volunteering with us and be a part of the solution!

impact1.title: Meaningful Impact
impact1.description: Contribute to the fight against hunger and help us provide essential nourishment to individuals and families facing food insecurity in our community.

impact2.title: Stronger Community
impact2.description: Be a catalyst for positive change by fostering a sense of community and solidarity. Join like-minded individuals who share the common goal of creating a hunger-free future.

impact3.title: Flexible Opportunities
impact3.description: We understand that your time is valuable. That's why we offer flexible volunteering options that fit your schedule, whether it's a few hours a week or a one-time event.

registration.title: Join Our Volunteer Community
registration.subtitle: Fill out the form below to get started with volunteering
registration.alreadyRegisteredDescription: Welcome to our volunteer community. You can now view available shifts and manage your schedule.

registrationRequired.title: Registration Required
registrationRequired.description: Please register as a volunteer first to view and sign up for shifts.
